title: makila
author: makila
created_time: October 22, 2022, 01:06:00 PMLast edit: October 27, 2022, 08:21:31 AM by makila
content: Hi all. Looking to sell this rare papersafe. I believe it was a reward for collecting all genesis coins and is signed on the back by the creator of genesis coins wheelz1200 and bg4.https://ibb.co/qRhdzWbhttps://ibb.co/mzsRPYMShips from europe.Looking for 0.05 shipped

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Hi makila, I am potentially interested in that piece. What is your request, what are you looking for?Did you plan to run an auction or are you waiting just best offer?Can you retrieve please the original post/ selling topic about this piece?

comments.author: makila
comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on October 22, 2022, 05:27:21 PMHi makila, I am potentially interested in that piece. What is your request, what are you looking for?Did you plan to run an auction or are you waiting just best offer?Can you retrieve please the original post/ selling topic about this piece?I think the original post got deleted, it was quite old. Im sure wheelz and or bg4 can confirm whats what if they see this post. I think i got it from an auction from minerjones if i remeber correctly, living in the vault since then since im not very active here.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: I dont rember if i sold this outright or if it was a prize (pretty sure it was a prize from my series 2 collection). I will have to check its been so many years since I did one of them!Either way yes me and bg4 got together in person and signed these together and sealed them on site.  I had a couple and he kept a couple I believe.  Unsure how many we did but it wasn't many at all.  Less than 10 if I had to guess.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.created_time: October 25, 2022, 06:42:05 PMLast edit: October 25, 2022, 08:00:08 PM by bitbollo
comments.body: thank you both for your replies/clarification @wheelz1200 and @makilaAt this point @makila, what would be your request for that item (it's ok also a message in private...more or less  )? Did you plan to sell directly to "best offer" or you want to go for an auction?
